actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to provide for the construction and operation by the Energy Research and Development Administration of a National Coal Conversion Demonstration Facility.

summary.text: Authorizes the Administrator of the Energy Research and Development Administration to construct and operate a National Coal Conversion Demonstration Facility for use in the coal conversion programs of the Administration.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the construction and operation by the Energy Research and Development Administration of a National Coal Conversion Demonstration Facility.
